org.diirt.service

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diirt.service.Service
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelFinderService, ExecService, GenericExecService, JDBCService, RPCService

    public class Service
extends Object
    Provides access to command/response type of communication for sources of data or RPC-like services. Each service is a collection of one of more methods. Each method can be executed with a set of parameters, and returns with a set of results.

    This class is immutable and therefore thread-safe. Subclasses are allowed and should also be immutable.

    Author:
    carcassi

    • Constructor Detail

      • Service

        public Service(ServiceDescription serviceDescription)
        Creates a new service given the description. All properties are copied out of the description, guaranteeing the immutability of objects of this class. Nonetheless, service descriptions should not be reused for different services.
        Parameters:
        serviceDescription - the description of the service, can't be null

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public final String getName()
        A brief name for the service. Used for service registration and lookup.
        Returns:
        the service name, can't be null

      • getDescription

        public final String getDescription()
        A description for the service.
        Returns:
        the service description, can't be null

      • getServiceMethods

        public final Map<String,ServiceMethod> getServiceMethods()
        Returns all the methods associated with this service.
        Returns:
        the service method, can't be null
